author: sdeboy
msg: Fixed undocked tab icon index issue.

author: sdeboy
msg: Added icon switching on the tab - if new events arrive for a non-active tab, an icon is set on the tab.  If events aren't currently being delivered but events have been received since the last time you visited the tab, a separate icon is displayed.  Once you select the tab, the icon is removed.

author: psmith
msg: undocked toolbar had a legacy button style.

author: psmith
msg: added nice rollover style buttons.  We would get this for free if
everyone ran JDK1.4, but since we're targetting 1.3 it's a nice to have.
Borrowed heavily from a book, but with some modifications to suit our
needs, hope there is enough explicit credit.
Note, the Metal L&F doesn't have a toolbar separator, so
the toolbar doesn't look as nice, we'll need to come up with our own
custom Toolbar separator for all L&F.

author: psmith
msg: added an Etched border around the Event count and filter panel, which
IMHO, kinda groups it nicely.  Also added a JToolbar.Separator to
separate the event count, but this is only visisible on some L&F, will
need to create our own consistent one across all L&F.
